name: Park Tool SA-3 HD Shop Apron
description: Look the part and emerge from the shop without grease-covered clothes. 7 big pockets stash the most useful tools or fasteners for quick access.Made of durable polyester and cotton twill.3 big lower pockets, 18.5 x 19cm.4 upper pockets, 11cm deep.Upper pockets can be buttoned to keep items in.35in. length, and the bottom 7 inches can be snapped up to shorten it.
